overview: When he finds out his boss is retiring to Arizona, a sailor, Ross Carpenter, has to find a way to buy the Westwind, a boat that he and his father built. He is also caught between two women: insensitive club singer Robin and sweet Laurel.
tagline: The Swingin'-est Elvis! + Girls (Girls, Girls) + Songs (lots of them). Who could ask for anything more?
cast: Elvis Presley|Stella Stevens|Jeremy Slate|Laurel Goodwin|Benson Fong
